pages.landing.question: What can I call you?
pages.preference.preference3.question: Let's see what EQ level you are suitable for now!
pages.dashboard.tip.title: Empathy
pages.dashboard.tip.text: is a cornerstone in building trust; validating others' feelings with phrases like "I can see why you feel that way " builds connection.
pages.dashboard.tip.advice: Reflect on your chat moments for analysis and advice.
pages.result.loading.splash:

 Let's take a look at your workplace personality type!
pages.result.result.title: My EQ report
pages.battlefield.intro.unit1.title: Unit 1
pages.battlefield.intro.unit1.subtitle: The boss's stomach worms
pages.battlefield.intro.unit1.desc: In a private room in an exquisite club, you have dinner with a senior leader and two colleagues. It seems like a relaxing gathering, but in fact the leader is secretly observing you and preparing to decide who will participate in an important project. You must please the leader and balance the relationship with your colleagues at the same time, because a small mistake may change your future.
pages.battlefield.task.subtitle: Tasks
pages.battlefield.task.task1: One sentence to make every colleague happy
pages.battlefield.task.task2: Order dishes that satisfy every colleague
pages.battlefield.loading.title: At dinner
illustration.animal.ostrich.name: Ostrich
illustration.animal.ostrich.characterist: It's as if you have a sixth sense, always able to keenly capture subtle emotional changes and hints.
illustration.animal.monkey.name: Monkey
illustration.animal.monkey.characteristi: Even under pressure, you are able to keep your emotions under control and remain calm and composed.
illustration.animal.hedgehog.name: Hedgehog
illustration.animal.hedgehog.characteris: You can always easily perceive and understand other people's emotions, as if you can read their minds.
illustration.animal.coyote.name: Coyote
illustration.animal.coyote.characteristi: You are like a bridge, easily bringing people closer together and inspiring everyone to work together and move forward together.
illustration.animal.capybara.name: Capybara
illustration.animal.capybara.characteris: You are like a flame, burning with endless energy, always focused on your goal, and constantly igniting the passion and motivation of those around you.
components.SProgressBar.unit1.name: The boss's stomach worms
components.SProgressBar.unit2.name: Being bullied by the boss
components.SProgressBar.unit3.name: Encountering unreasonable colleagues
